biography.bio: Udo Schenk was born on April 11, 1953 in Wittenberge, German Democratic Republic. He is known for his work on In aller Freundschaft (1998), Don't Look for Me (2004) and Gruber's Journey (2008). He is married to Marina Krogull.
biography.name: Udo Schenk

biography.bio: Rainer Hunold was born on November 1, 1949 in Brunswick, Lower Saxony, West Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Dr. Sommerfeld - Neues vom Bülowbogen (1997), Der Staatsanwalt (2005) and Un cas pour deux (1981). He has been married to Petra Offizorz since 1989. They have two children.
biography.name: Rainer Hunold

biography.bio: Karina Thayenthal was born on April 2, 1961 in St. Gallen, Switzerland. She is an actress, known for The Country Doctor (1987), Der Weg nach Lourdes (1989) and Da wo die Berge sind (2000). She is married to Peter A. Rey. She was previously married to Robert Thayenthal.
biography.name: Karina Thayenthal

biography.bio: Marina Krogull was born on October 21, 1961 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for Der Prinz hinter den sieben Meeren (1982), Anton the Magician (1978) and Amor holt sich nasse Füße (1978). She is married to Udo Schenk.
biography.name: Marina Krogull

biography.bio: Elfi Eschke was born on December 8, 1961 in Bremen, Germany. She is an actress, known for Oben ohne (2007), Ilona und Kurti (1992) and Eine fast perfekte Scheidung (1997).
biography.name: Elfi Eschke

biography.bio: Heinz Schimmelpfennig was born on April 6, 1919 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Hürdenlauf (1969), Ferdinand le radical (1976) and Das Fräulein (1967). He was married to Hanne Wieder. He died on December 31, 2010 in Gernsbach, Baden-Württemberg, Germany.
biography.name: Heinz Schimmelpfennig

biography.bio: Jean-Paul Raths was born on August 10, 1955 in Useldingen, Luxembourg. He is an actor, known for Stadtklinik (1993), The Ninth Day (2004) and Klassen Feind (1983).
biography.name: Jean-Paul Raths

biography.bio: Joachim Bernhard was born in 1961. He is an actor, known for Das Boot (1981), Le bateau (1985) and La balançoire (1983).
biography.name: Joachim Bernhard

biography.bio: Petra Maria Grühn was born on November 18, 1950 in Darmstadt, Hesse, West Germany. She is an actress, known for The Woman Across the Way (1978), Die Maus (1975) and Rhinegold (1978).
biography.name: Petra Maria Grühn

biography.bio: Werner Eichhorn was born on November 15, 1922 in Leal, Estonia. He was an actor, known for La montagne magique (1982), The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum (1975) and Wovon die Menschen leben (1965). He died on July 14, 2005 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Werner Eichhorn

biography.bio: Karin Grüger is an actress, known for Lea (1983), Der schwarze Obelisk (1988) and Robin Hood: Ghosts of Sherwood (2012).
biography.name: Karin Grüger

biography.bio: Ilona Schneider is an actress, known for Der schwarze Obelisk (1988) and Acte institucional de l'Onze de Setembre (2015).
biography.name: Ilona Schneider

biography.bio: Frauke Janssen was born in 1932. She is an actress, known for August (1961), Kaspar (1969) and Der schwarze Obelisk (1988).
biography.name: Frauke Janssen

biography.bio: Stephan Schwartz was born on October 18, 1951 in West Berlin, West Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Freunde fürs Leben (1992), Verdammt verliebt (2002) and Victoria (1979).
biography.name: Stephan Schwartz

biography.bio: Siegfried Grönig was born on April 20, 1942 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Die Wicherts von nebenan (1986), Sonny Boys (1982) and Wer spinnt denn da, Herr Doktor? (1982). He died on July 24, 2000 in Berlin.
biography.name: Siegfried Grönig
